commands.name: stats
commands.desc: Check Growtopia Server Status, Time & WOTD.

commands.name: notify
commands.desc: Get notification immediately when Growtopia server goes up or down. This command is for donors only.

commands.name: info <item name>
commands.desc: Search item recipes or infos.

commands.name: search <keyword>
commands.desc: Get list of items matching with keyword.

commands.name: render <world name>
commands.desc: Showing specified world render with last render date.

commands.name: wotd
commands.desc: View World Of The Day render.

commands.name: image <item name>
commands.desc: View Item sprite in 128x128 size.

commands.name: ign <mention user OR your GrowID>
commands.desc: Find/Set GrowID.

commands.name: feedback <your message>
commands.desc: Leave feedback/suggestion about Growtopian bot.

commands.name: about
commands.desc: View information about bot.

commands.name: donate
commands.desc: You will receive random amount of gems

commands.name: bfg
commands.desc: Work at BFG and earn some gems

commands.name: use <number>
commands.desc: Harvest your providers and consume items, do /items to view providers and items you own.

commands.name: profile <optional: username>
commands.desc: View your inventory

commands.name: gift <amount> <item name> <@user>
commands.desc: Gift an user one of your items, currently available items are wl, dl & gems.

commands.name: title <title ID>
commands.desc: Change your title from titles you own, you can view your titles from /titles

commands.name: titles
commands.desc: View what titles you have, use title command to change your title

commands.name: items
commands.desc: View items you own

commands.name: top
commands.desc: View Leaderboard

commands.name: store
commands.desc: View Store

commands.name: quiz
commands.desc: Take a quiz and win some gems

commands.name: dragstats
commands.desc: View your dragon status

commands.name: dragwar <@user/userid>
commands.desc: Start dragonwar against someone with a dragon

commands.name: bonus
commands.desc: Claim your reward every 24 hours

commands.name: weekly
commands.desc: Claim your weekly reward. This command is for donors only.

commands.name: quest
commands.desc: Get your daily quest and get 10,000 Gems

commands.name: petbattle <player name>
commands.desc: Pet battle against a member, should have at least 3000 gems

commands.name: harvest <count> <item name>
commands.desc: View amount of average block/seed drops from harvesting

commands.name: break <count> <item name>
commands.desc: View amount of average block/seed drops from breaking

commands.name: xp <Current Level> <Target Level>
commands.desc: Find XP Required to level up

commands.name: prefix <new prefix>
commands.desc: Set custom prefix for your server

commands.name: settings
commands.desc: View Growtopian settings for the server

commands.name: blacklist <#channelname>
commands.desc: Block commands executing at selected channels

commands.name: disable <category (game & general)>
commands.desc: Toggle command categories to be usable at typed channels

commands.name: gm <#channel name> <text>
commands.desc: Broadcast using bot at selected channel

commands.name: ban <user id/mention> <reason>
commands.desc: Ban selected person

commands.name: unban <user ID>
commands.desc: Remove selected user's ban

commands.name: title <name>
commands.desc: Change your title to whatever you want

commands.name: customcolor <#HEXCODE>
commands.desc: Change your profile color

commands.name: weekly
commands.desc: Claim your weekly reward

commands.name: notify
commands.desc: Get notification immediately when Growtopia server goes up or down. This command is for donors only.
